name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. James GLENN, Appellee

judges: Before CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. James GLENN, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 23rd day of March, 2004, the order of the Bucks County Court of Common Pleas is reversed insofar as it declared the Registration of Sexual Offenders Act unconstitutional, and the case is remanded for further proceedings. See Commonwealth v. Williams, 574 Pa. 487, 832 A.2d 962 (2003); Commonwealth v. Maldonado, 576 Pa. 101, 838 A.2d 710 (2003).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Jennifer Anne Buck, Diane E. Gibbons, Doylestown, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Bradley Harry Bastedo, Doylestown, for James Glenn.
casebody.head_matter:
845 A.2d 765
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. James GLENN, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 13, 2004.
Decided March 23, 2004.
Jennifer Anne Buck, Diane E. Gibbons, Doylestown, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Bradley Harry Bastedo, Doylestown, for James Glenn.
Before CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
